display_long_description:
Welcome to your first day on the warehouse floor, conveyors are down, automation’s looming, and it’s up to you to keep the parcels moving.

Parcel Pummel is a fast-paced VR action game where you match, grab, and launch colour-coded packages into the right delivery trucks. Beat the clock, master your aim, and rise through increasingly frantic levels in this pixel-styled, physically engaging experience.

Features:
📦 Intuitive throwing mechanics
⏱️ Beat-the-clock gameplay with escalating difficulty
🎮 Retro-inspired visuals and immersive sound
🚚 Challenge yourself with new levels and parcel chaos

Built originally for VR Game Jam 2023, Parcel Pummel blends nostalgic charm with modern VR action. Whether you're a casual player or competitive speed-runner, this warehouse won't sort itself... time to pummel some parcels.
